basics.name: Rana Vikram Krishna
basics.label: Senior Frontend Developer
basics.summary: I'm a product-focused JavaScript developer with over 6+ years of experience. My core skills include React.js, React Native. I develop web/ mobile applications using the latest technologies to deliver the product with quality code.
basics.objective: Eager to expand my skill set through external trainings to help boost all major front desk KPIs. Hoping to leverage organizational skills to help Companies introduce time-saving schemes for all executives.

work.name: SaaSPay
work.summary:
• Led the Frontend Team: Spearheaded the frontend team at SaaSPay, fostering a culture of collaboration and continuous learning.
  • Full Product Lifecycle Involvement: Initiated the SaaSPay project from brainstorming and ideation to creating user stories, managing sprints, and overseeing the development of the BNPL (Buy Now, Pay Later) solution.
  • Collaborative Development: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to seamlessly integrate proof-of-concepts (POC) and code examples into the product's frontend.
  • Mentorship and Guidance: Provided mentorship and guidance to other developers, fostering their professional growth within a high-performing team.

work.name: SawoLabs
work.summary:
• Leadership and Mentorship: Led the frontend team at SawoLabs, fostering a culture of collaboration and continuous learning.
  • Full Product Lifecycle Involvement: Played a pivotal role in the entire product development process and overseeing the development of identity management solutions.
  • Optimization and UX Enhancement: Optimized applications for maximum speed and scalability, enhancing user satisfaction.
  • Proactive Learning: Proactively learned and applied new technologies, design practices, and usability patterns, staying ahead of industry trends.

work.name: LoanTube
work.position: Software Engineer / React Js / React Native Developer
work.summary:
• Solo Project Management: Single-handedly managed the entire product development process for web and mobile apps at LoanTube, demonstrating strong technical expertise and project management skills.
  • Standardized Approach: Implemented a standardized, responsive, mobile-first approach and strategy for all output, enhancing accessibility and user engagement.
  • Collaborative Development: Collaborated closely with product team members to incorporate new features and requirements, aligning with project goals and objectives.
  • Agile Methodologies: Employed agile methodologies and best practices to ensure high-quality, maintainable, and scalable solutions that met or exceeded client expectations.

work.name: TallyX
work.summary:
• Backend Collaboration: Collaborated closely with backend developers to integrate REST APIs with UI components, ensuring a dynamic and seamless platform.
  • Meta-Driven UI Engine: Designed and implemented a Meta (JSON) driven UI engine, significantly accelerating product development and improving overall efficiency.
  • Best Practices: Employed best practices in component-based architecture, enabling easy maintenance and scalability of the web products.
  • Code Quality Assurance: Actively participated in code reviews and provided constructive feedback to improve code quality.

work.name: Thomson Reuters
work.summary:
• Cross-Platform Applications: Developed cross-platform responsive web applications using HTML, SCSS, and JavaScript.
  • Issue Resolution: Collaborated with a team of developers to troubleshoot and resolve front-end and CSS issues.
  • Project Leadership: Led the implementation of a new mainframe development project.
  • Management Updates: Managed project plans and provided regular status updates to management.

work.name: Freelance
work.summary:
• Created a React Native application for a HealthCare startup, facilitating connections between doctors, nurses, and patients within a comprehensive marketplace.
  • Engineered a React Native application for the RiteMaid service, streamlining the booking process for professional cleaning services.
  • Crafted user-friendly interfaces and enhanced user experiences for the digital platforms of various small companies.
  • Proficient in Shopify and WordPress development, with expertise in theme creation and customization.

activities.achievements:
• React and redux - A complete guide 2019 from Udemy
  • Best performer award for consistently exceeding the performance - Tallyx
  • Certificate of exceptional bug-finder - Upwork

awards.title: Certificate of best frontend developer
awards.summary: Awarded for exceptional improvements made to improve user experience
